title: Multi Grain ðŸŒ¾ Roti/ 5 flour rottallu/ Healthy Nutrition Roti
content:
1/2 cup = 160 gms Ingredients: Wheat flour - 1/2 cup Rice flour - 1/2 cup Bajra/ Sajja pindi/ Pearl Millet flour - 1/2 cup Jowar/ Jonna pindi/ Sorghum flour - 1/2 cup Ragi / Finger millet flour - 1/2 cup Finely chopped onion - 1 cup Green chilli paste - 2 tb sp Coriander - chopped - 1/2 cup Curry leaves - chopped - 5 Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 2 tb sp Sesame seeds (White/Black) - 2 tb sp Salt - to taste Oil - 3 tb sp Procedure:
  • Add all flour's in medium sized bowl
  • Add salt, jeera, green chillies paste, Sesame seeds and chopped curry leaves
  • Mix them well
  • Add onion and coriander mix them well
  • Add sufficient water to make perfect dough
  • Dough should be soft and non sticky
  • Divide dough into equal parts
  • Make medium sized balls with hands
  • Take butter paper andÂ Apply oil on it
  • Spread it equally andÂ Put one ball on it
  • Press and tap with hand by applying oil on your hands and on it
  • Heat tava on medium to high
  • Apply oil on tava and flip the butter paper with roti on tava
  • Cook both sides of roti by applying oil on it
  • Serve it hot with mango pickle and fresh curd
  • Multi Grain Roti is ready for Breakfast ðŸ˜ƒ
